full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
## Procurement Details

### Date and Time
- **Publication Date**: February 22, 2023
- **Tender Closing Date**: March 8, 2023, 1:00 PM EST
- **Expected Contract Start Date**: None
- **Expected Contract End Date**: None

### Procurement Category and Method
- **Procurement Category**: Government Defence Procurement
- **Procurement Method**: Competitive Selective Tendering

### Tender Description
The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the procurement of various electrical cables and connectors for 202 WS Montreal, Quebec. The deadline for delivery is March 31, 2023.

### Items Required
- Item 1: Backshell Electrical Connector
- Item 2: Backshell Electrical Connector
- Item 3: Radio Frequency Cable
- Item 4: Radio Frequency Cable
- Item 5: Electrical Plug Connector
- Item 6: Electrical Fiche Connector
- Item 7: Electrical Receptacle Connector
- Item 8: Electrical Fiche Connector
- Item 9: Electrical Plug Connector
- Item 10: Electrical Fiche Connector
- Item 11: Backshell Electrical Connector
- Item 12: Insulation Sleeving
- Item 13: Cable Marker Sleeve
- Item 14: Insulation Sleeving
- Item 15: Electrical Plug Connector
- Item 16: Electrical Fiche Connector
- Item 17: Electrical Receptacle Connector
- Item 18: Terminal Lug
- Item 19: Fuse
- Item 20: Electrical Receptacle Connector
- Item 21: Special Purpose Electrical Cable
- Item 22: Electrical Wire
- Item 23: Electrical Wire
- Item 24: Splice Conductor
- Item 25: Special Purpose Electrical Cable Assembly

### Submission Guidelines

Please submit your tender electronically to [Caroline.Savoie@forces.gc.ca](mailto:Caroline.Savoie@forces.gc.ca) by 1:00 PM EST on March 8, 2023.

### Feedback and Communication
Debriefings will be conducted upon request. Please contact Caroline Savoie at [Caroline.Savoie@forces.gc.ca](mailto:Caroline.Savoie@forces.gc.ca) for inquiries. 

### References
None available.
